pr_title: Restart nucleus when proxy or role alias parameters change

timeline.message: Restart nucleus when proxy or role alias parameters change
Only restart for role alias when network proxy is used and use device config

timeline.author: MikeDombo

timeline.bodyText: don't concat, just use the no proxy key.
timeline.author: MikeDombo

timeline.bodyText: This isn't correct because it could have a different name, you'd need to search for the component by type.
timeline.author: MikeDombo

replies.bodyText: Using getProposedNucleusConfig which searches for ComponentType.NUCLEUS
replies.author: tomnagy-aws

timeline.bodyText: Shouldn't this return true if the currentDeviceConfiguration has proxy settings? (in the null "new" case)
